prime.gui.styling.StyleTypes

type
class
available in
swf
metadata
:build
'???'
:keep

Static Variables

ELEMENT_SELECTOR(inline,null) : Int

Styles declared to match with IStyleable class-types (the packagename + classname) Equal to css "H1" rule.

ELEMENT_STATE_SELECTOR(inline,null) : Int

Styles declared as a state of another selector. Equal to css "elementSelector:statename" rule.

ID_SELECTOR(inline,null) : Int

Styles declared with the id of a IStyleable classes Equal to css "#idname" rule.

ID_STATE_SELECTOR(inline,null) : Int

Styles declared as a state of another selector. Equal to css "idSelector:statename" rule.

STYLENAME_SELECTOR(inline,null) : Int

Styles declared to match with a value from IStyleable.styleNames Equal to css ".stylename" rule.

STYLENAME_STATE_SELECTOR(inline,null) : Int

Styles declared as a state of another selector. Equal to css "styleNameSelector:statename" rule.
